榮任.definition: to be appointed or elevated to a post

榮宗耀祖.definition: to bring honor to one's ancestors (idiom); also written 光宗耀祖

榮成.definition: Rongcheng, county-level city in Weihai 威海, Shandong

榮成市.definition: Rongcheng, county-level city in Weihai 威海, Shandong

榮成灣.definition: Roncheng bay near Weihai 威海市 on north coast of Shandong

榮昌.definition: Rongchang, a district of Chongqing 重慶|重庆[Chong2qing4]

榮昌區.definition: Rongchang, a district of Chongqing 重慶|重庆[Chong2qing4]

榮毅仁.definition: Rong Yiren (1916-2005), PRC Vice President from 1993-1998, played an important role in opening Chinese economy to Western investors

榮民.definition: (Tw) retired soldier; veteran (abbr. for 榮譽國民|荣誉国民[rong2yu4 guo2min2])

榮河縣.definition: Ronghe former county in 運城|运城[Yun4 cheng2], Shanxi, present Linyi county 臨猗縣|临猗县[Lin2 yi1 xian4]

榮登.definition: (of a list, music chart etc) to reach the top

榮縣.definition: Rong county in Zigong 自貢|自贡[Zi4 gong4], Sichuan

榮總.definition: (Tw) Veterans General Hospital (used in the names of hospitals in Taipei, Taichung etc) (abbr. for 榮民總醫院|荣民总医院[Rong2min2 Zong3yi1yuan4])

榮華富貴.definition: glory, splendor, wealth and rank (idiom); high position and great wealth

榮譽博士學位.pinyin: róng yù bó shì xué wèi

榮譽軍人.definition: disabled soldier; serviceman wounded in action

榮軍.definition: abbr. for 榮譽軍人|荣誉军人[rong2 yu4 jun1 ren2]

榮辱與共.definition: (of friends or partners) to share both the honor and the disgrace (idiom)

榮辱觀.definition: precepts regarding what is honorable and what is shameful (in particular, refers to the Socialist Concepts on Honors and Disgraces, PRC official moral principles promulgated from 2006); abbr. for 社會主義榮辱觀|社会主义荣辱观; also known as the Eight Honors and Eight Shames 八榮八恥|八荣八耻[Ba1 Rong2 Ba1 Chi3]
